explanation: [0-0] A man is standing on an outdoor lawn, wearing a blue and white short-sleeved shirt, holding potato chips in his right hand and a potato chip can in his left hand. He is opening his mouth, with some trees and white buildings behind him and a red motorcycle parked next to him.
